channel.title: PythonTips on 布萊德的學習網站

item.title: [Python] Some Tips
item.description: 原帖: Python开发的10个小贴士 Tips 1: List Comprehension [Python] Comprehensions Concepts Tips 2: Directly Get Value of List object Bad bag = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5] for i in range(len(bag)): print(bag[i]) Good bag = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5] for i in bag: print(i) Get the index of list itme if you need bag = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5] for index, element in enumerate(bag): print(index, element) Tips 3: Exchange the value of variables Bad a = 5 b = 10 tmp = a a = b b = tmp Good a = 5 b = 10 a, b = b, a Tips 4: Initialize List General bag = [] for _ in range(10): bag.
